messages.message:
Have a pet peeve, hoping someone who manages webapp can help
https://dogfood.instabase.com/account/login - this works
https://dogfood.instabase.com/account/login/ - this gives 404

In Django for example, this is a settting (ADD_TRAILING_SLASH). If you go to the wrong one, it redirects.
On Github, https://github.com/instabase/instabase/ and https://github.com/instabase/instabase work.
Would be great do one of these two instead of returning a 404.
this happens with a lot of hyperlinks in our docs aswell
